prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---

Program in Plain English is a 4th generation language that converts natural language specifications into functional applications, allowing users to write what they want and get what they need.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Program in Plain English, 4th generation language, natural language specifications, functional applications, convert, write, get
